General.Name: Quadpack Industries SA
General.Description: Quadpack Industries, S.A. designs, develops, manufactures, and supplies packaging products for the cosmetics industry. It offers personalized standard packaging and customized/bespoke packs for skin care, make-up, fragrance, and other sectors. The company's products include bottles and caps, deodorants, travel sprays, bottles and lotion packs, compacts, cosmetic bottles, flow pens, jars, lipgloss, sticks, tubes, and secondary packaging and accessories. It also provides wood packaging and decoration products. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Barcelona, Spain. Quadpack Industries, S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Eudald Holdings, S.L.
